item.title: CLIP Guided Neural Cellular Automata using PyTorch
item.description: The gif above was generated using outputs from a Neural Cellular Automata model steered by OpenAI’s CLIP (language model trained on image-text pairs) using the text prompt “The PyTorch Logo”.
